thread.title: Real Racing 3 Update Adds 5 New Cars
thread.title_full: Real Racing 3 Update Adds 5 New Cars

author: Steve_OS
title: Real Racing 3 Update Adds 5 New Cars
text: Real Racing 3 Update Adds 5 New Cars 08:22 AM - October 21, 2015 by Steve_OS The McLaren 650S GT3, 1995 McLaren F1 GTR, McLaren P1 GTR, 1969 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray 427, and 2014 Chevrolet Corvette Stingray Coupe Z51 3LT (C7) are available now, as a free download for Real Racing 3. The game itself is also free for iOS and Android devices. Quote: Real Racing 3 is celebrating the 20th anniversary of the McLaren victory at Le Mans by putting players behind the wheel of the legendary McLaren F1 GTR that won Le Mans in 1995, and giving them the chance to race to win the McLaren P1 GTR. The update also expands on what's available for muscle car fans with the new and classic Corvette Stingrays. Players can win the new cars in two all-new special events: Starting with the Born for Victory event where players can celebrate McLaren's historic triumph at the 1995 24 Hours of Le Mans endurance race and win a McLaren P1 GTR (available now) And starting November 15, with the Stingray Evolution event, where players can revel in the muscle car to win the awesome Corvette Stingray Z51 (starting November 15) Platform: iOS Votes for game: 1 - View All Real Racing 3 Videos
